articles.title: Concerns over autocracy in the U.S. continue to grow - NPR
articles.description: Is America still a democracy? Scholars tell NPR that after the last year under President Trump, the country has slid closer to autocracy or may already be there.
articles.content: As the United States heads toward the midterm elections, there are growing concerns among some political scientists that the country has moved even further along the path to some form of autocracy. … [+4902 chars]

articles.title: What is the dart frog toxin allegedly used to kill Alexei Navalny? - BBC
articles.description: The toxin, epibatidine, can be found in frogs in the wild in South America or manufactured in a lab.
articles.content: Because it overstimulates these nerve receptors, if dosed correctly, it can cause muscle twitching, paralysis, seizures, slow heart rate, respiratory failure and ultimately death, she explained.
